mapper.select: SELECT kudosPoints FROM volunteer WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE volunteer SET kudosPoints = kudosPoints - #{points} WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO redemptionrecords (userId, itemId, pointsUsed, createdAt) VALUES (#{userId}, #{itemId}, #{pointsUsed}, NOW())
INSERT INTO rewardstore (itemUrl, itemName, itemDescription, pointsRequired, stock) VALUES (#{itemUrl}, #{itemName}, #{itemDescription}, #{pointsRequired}, #{stock})
